The study area encompassed the stratigraphic range of the Daptocephalus Assemblage Zone (Balfour and upper Teekloof formations). Four field sites were chosen near Cradock, Nieu Bethesda, Beaufort West, and Gariep Dam (Fig.Â 1). Numerous fossils were collected and stratigraphically recorded. Vertical sections measured compiled four composite sections, one for each field site. This was done to investigate Late Permian Karoo Basin litho, bio, and sequence stratigraphy. This research also required referral to research conducted by previous workers to corroborate findings
36, 54 .
